type.name: type_drilsdown_casestudy
type.wiki:
{{noheading}} :title {{name}} +inset
{{description wikify="true"}} {{image src="::*" message="" width="300"}}
-inset +section {{tree message="" heading="All Content" box.maxheight="400"}} -section +section {{gallery width="200" columns="3" popup="true" thumbnail="true" caption="Figure ${count}: ${name}" popupcaption="over" message="" heading="Images"}} -section +section {{tabs entries.filter="type:python_notebook" message="" heading="Notebooks"}} -section +section
{{map width="800" height="400" listentries="true" entries.filter="type:type_idv_bundle" message="" heading="Geolocated IDV Bundles"}}
-section
